song_name: Super Smash Bros Ultimate - Main Theme
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Super Smash Bros Ultimate - Main Theme is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Super Smash Bros Ultimate - Main Theme has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Minor, A Dorian,  and A Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
